1.name: Telangana Startup Portal
points: An ERP web application where startups will upload documents and their startup information and it will be judged and financed by the Telangana Government at various authorization levels.
Developed User Chat Interfaces, Social Signup and Payment Modules.
The database covers 3 levels of authority viz Agents who review application, the project manager who add agents and do final review and admin who manage everything related to the web application.
